cards.title: Trump says EU and Mexico face 30% tariff from August
cards.summary: Trump says he would impose even higher import taxes if either of the US trading partners decided to retaliate. The 27-member EU said earlier this week it hoped to agree a deal with Washington before 1 August. Trump has also said the US will impose new tariffs on

cards.title: The mushroom killer was obsessed with true crime. Now true crime fans are obsessâ€¦
cards.summary: It was in one of Australia's smallest courtrooms that its biggest trial took place. Journalists have descended from around the world to cover her murder trial.

cards.title: North Korea reaffirms support for Russia's war in Ukraine
cards.summary: Western officials believe Pyongyang has sent an estimated 11,000 troops to Russia over the last year to fight against Ukraine. North Korean leader Kim Jong Un offered Moscow his "unconditional support" on the Ukraine war.
